arts.ttl: Danny Johnson salvages point for leaders Walsall at Doncaster
arts.sum: The home side had twice taken the lead.

arts.ttl: The lowdown on Walsall 1 AFC Wimbledon 1 - Dons let lead slip for second week running
arts.sum: Harbottle spent most of the game playing so far upfield that the defence was in effect a back two of Joe Lewis and Ryan Johnson, with Jake Reeves just in front of them. Ten points and three blown leads from the last nine games is very far from good enough and nowhere near promotion form.

arts.ttl: ‘I think…’ – EFL boss in League Two promotion prediction regarding Bradford City and Walsall
arts.sum: Bradford City and Walsall will secure automatic promotion from League Two, Chesterfield boss Paul Cook has said. Bradford… The post ‘I think…’ – EFL boss in League Two promotion prediction regarding Bradford City and Walsall appeared first on The72 - Football League News.
